Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class DevelopmentCardSlot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DevelopmentCardSlot
public class DevelopmentCardSlot
extends java.lang.Object
In each slot, the max number of DevelopmentCard is 3 The slot is managed as an array where the cards are overlapped based on their level

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DevelopmentCardSlot()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Color[] get_colors()
    Method that returns the list of colours appeared in the slot
    Color get_secondLevelColor()
    Method that returns the colour of the level 2 DevelopmentCard This method could be used to activate Leaders effect
    DevelopmentCard get_top()
    method that returns the "active" card on the slot, returns null if the slot is empty
    DevelopmentCard getCard​(int stacked)  
    int getSlotPV()  
    int levelOfTop()
    method that returns the level of the top card, if the slot is empty returns zero.
    int numberOfCardsInSlot()
    counts the number of cards in the slot
    boolean placeCard​(DevelopmentCard CardToPlace)
    method that places the card on the slot, returns true if the operation is done correctly, false otherwise
    void pvSlot()
    method that updates the victory points of the slot
    void setSlotPV​(int slotPV)

      public Color get_secondLevelColor()
      Method that returns the colour of the level 2 DevelopmentCard This method could be used to activate Leaders effect

    • get_top

      public DevelopmentCard get_top()
      method that returns the "active" card on the slot, returns null if the slot is empty
      Returns:
      null if slot is empty, the card otherwise

    • placeCard

      public boolean placeCard​(DevelopmentCard CardToPlace)
      method that places the card on the slot, returns true if the operation is done correctly, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      CardToPlace - card "acquired"
      Returns:
      true if operation is done successfully, false otherwise

    • pvSlot

      public void pvSlot()
      method that updates the victory points of the slot

    • levelOfTop

      public int levelOfTop()
      method that returns the level of the top card, if the slot is empty returns zero.
      Returns:
      an integer between 0-3 that represent the last level occupied
